info.title: about
info.description: Hi there! I'm a student at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute studying computer science. Throughout my coding journey, I've learned programming languages ranging from Java to C++ to Typescript and participated in various open source projects. When I'm not writing code or sleeping, I would most likely be listening to music or dancing.

subsections.title: VZCode
subsections.description: VZCode is a multiplayer code editing tool that supports real-time collaboration. Our goal was to improve the user experience with additional capabilities so that the platform could function as an alternative to VSCode. I focused on enhancing the presence of remote users by implementing 5 new features, such as displaying usernames and adding uniquely colored cursors. Previously, users can see that someone joined their collaborative session but not know who it was. Now with these new features, remote users could be easily identified, creating a more collaborative environment.

subsections.title: YACS – Yet Another Course Scheduler
subsections.description: YACS is an open-source web application that allows students to view course options, track dates of final exams, and calculate their GPA. I built user-requested features, such as an option to display time in 24-hour format, and debugged user-submitted issues.

content.title: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
content.subtitle: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
info: ACCEL program candidate on track to obtain B.S in 3 years
Relevant Coursework: Rensselaer Center for Open Source (RCOS), Introduction to Algorithms, Data Structures

content.title: Patina Network
content.subtitle: Software Engineering Intern
info: Created a custom CI/CD pipeline with the Github CLI, enabling 12 developers to confidently merge 60 PRs/week by running tests in Github Actions and automatically labeling code reviews via Gerrit’s REST API
Researched and compiled comprehensive documentation on the pipeline development process to allow other contributors to easily extend code functionality
Built backend endpoints with Java and Spring to handle event data in our Postgres database via SQL, and integrated frontend access using the Fetch API
Worked cross functionally with UI/UX designers to implement Figma mocks for Patina Network’s website by leveraging React, Typescript, and Mantine UI
Broke down projects into tasks tracked in the Linear project management app and worked in an Agile environment with frequent standups, retros, and 1:1s
Engaged in code reviews and upheld code quality by following a style guide and using formatters and linters

content.title: RCOS
content.subtitle: VZCode
info: Contributed to open source by streamlining 5 new features to emphasize remote presence on a multiplayer code editing platform and improve real-time collaboration in Typescript, React, and Node.js
Improved collaboration by displaying usernames above uniquely colored cursors and alerting users to changes in session participants

content.title: HackRPI
content.subtitle: Junior Director of Marketing
info: Increased the number of hackathon participants by 250% – from 200 attendees in 2022 to 500 in 2023
Oversee the Marketing and UX Design teams and ensure communication with 5 additional teams
Plan and execute external marketing campaigns by engaging with 40+ universities and high schools
